description: yeehaa is an ecosystem architect with a PhD in Philosophy, blending academia and tech expertise. As the founder of Offcourse and creator of Superconnectors, he's dedicated to transforming education and knowledge sharing. His work spans from exploring ecosystem evolution and internet fragmentation to advocating for decentralized systems and regenerative design. Based in Taipei, yeehaa focuses on uniting people around shared values and translating visions into effective ecosystems. His blog posts and courses reflect a deep interest in innovation, sustainability, and the future of digital landscapes.
blurb: yeehaa, an ecosystem architect with a PhD, merges philosophy and tech to revolutionize education and knowledge sharing. His work explores digital ecosystems, decentralization, and regenerative design, aiming to create inclusive and sustainable futures in the digital age.
